name: MemeStock
description: Welcome to your meme stockpile! If you want to compete for the greatest meme or just want to take a look at a large gallery of memes, then this is the app for you. The more likes you get, the more experience you earn, which will move you up in the MemeStock Rankings. Show off your memes on MemeStock today!
tech: Swift, SDWebImage, Alamofire, JGProgressHUD, Node/Express, s3, MongoDB/Mongoose

name: Entello
description: A realtime trivia multiplayer game! Just type in your favorite username, select a photo, and send the game code to your friends. You can also message your friends in realtime while the game is happening. Start working your brain muscles on Entello!
tech: Swift, Alamofire, SDWebImage, Google-Mobile-Ads-SDK, Firebase Core, Firebase Auth, Firebase Database, Firebase Analytics, Firebase Messaging, Firebase Crashlytics, ImagePicker, ChameleonFramework, JGProgressHUD, Node/Express, s3, MongoDB/Mongoose

name: Gossa
description: A topic based forum for everyone! If you have an college email, there is even a private section for only the students at your college. You can post questions, repond to posts and create your own chat rooms. Get started on Gossa today!
tech: Swift, Alamofire, SDWebImage, Firebase Core, Firebase Auth, Firebase Database, Firebase Analytics, Firebase Messaging, Firebase Crashlytics, ImagePicker, ChameleonFramework, JGProgressHUD, Node/Express, s3

name: ARKit Demo
description: This is a interactive AR game called "Hit The Sandwich". It was created using ARKit in Swift. The second portion of the video is a drawing feature also using ARKit.

name: Spamingo
description: A game where you're a space flamingo protecting the world against an invasion of cats, pandas, and cows!

description: This is website was created for Du-All Safety, who provides safety services to the public and private sectors in California and throughout the United States. Du-All Safety assists businesses with Federal OSHA, CAL/OSHA, and environmental compliance

name: Vituity Patient Scheduler
description: I personally created this program for Vituity Practice Management to speed up the process of entering patient information and scheduling anesthesiologist's to specific hospitals and patients. The average time to enter a day's worth of patients and assign doctors to them is roughly 4 hours. With this program, I have reduced the time for scheduling anesthesiologists and entering patient information to 1 hour.

name: Big Ol' Brews
description: This application searches through a complete database of all the Belgian beers in the world. You will be able look up any beer by the specific type of beer, by specific beer name, and by the brewery that sells it. You will also be able filter the database by alcohol content percentage by using the slide bar at the top of the page.

name: Custom Online Quiz
description: Do you love Game of Thrones? Do you like to brag to all your friends about all the random facts you know about the show? Take this interactive Game of Thrones Trivia Quiz that was built to really put your Game of Thrones knowledge to the test! This app was inspired by my love for Game of Thrones and my love for trivia.

name: Chattin-It-Up
description: This application uses Node.js and socket.io to create a real time chat experience that anyone can enjoy. Users can log in with their usernames, which is unique to them and cannot be used by anyone else. There is a Community chat everyone lands into when logged in. Then if anyone is online, they can easily make a private with that person with just a simple click. and for those curious users, you will be able to see everyone online and see when someone leaves the private chat you created.

name: Custom Group Chat App
description: This application uses Node.js/Express, Socket.io, and MongoDB/Mongoose to create a real time chat experience for all of its users. There is a special login page when you click the delete button. On this page, only an Admin with a specific password will be able to delete all of the current chat messages. When the admin enters the correct password, it will delete all of the messages that are currently in the database, which will reset the group chat's current messages. The next time the user logs in, all of the messages that occurred before deletion will disappear.
tech: HTML, CSS/Bootstrap, JavaScript, JQuery, Node.js/Express, Socket.io, MongoDB/Mongoose

name: Emotion Analysis
description: This application uses Get and Post requests for two different APIs and displays an analysis based on the keywords from the user’s input. It will display percentages of 6 different emotions and the one emotion that has the highest percentage will be sent to the second API to display images of that emotion the user is feeling.
